nodes.text: The krastenane was a creature, and one of many Sith warbeasts. The Bestiary of Darth Caldoth, an ancient Sith text, included mention of the krastenane. When the Sith apprentice Ry Nymbis was abandoned in a slaver camp on Simoth by his master, the Sith Lord Darth Caldoth, he was forced to fight through various creatures, including krastenanes.

Krastenanes were first mentioned in Dooku: Jedi Lost, an audiobook written by Cavan Scott and published in 2019. As Dooku: Jedi Lost was released solely in audio format, the name's spelling was unconfirmed, but the krastenane was later mentioned in the short story "Gaze of Stone," written by George Mann and published in the book Myths & Fables. The script for Dooku: Jedi Lost confirmed that the creature mentioned in the audiobook was the krastenane mentioned in "Gaze of Stone."
